data.prayer: Father, encourage the 4,368 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Batinah South, Oman
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Al Batinah South, Oman and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 153 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Al Batinah South, Oman know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 4,368 believers in the state of Al Batinah South into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Hobyot people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Al Batinah South unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Al Batinah South, Oman to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: There are 668,600 people living in the state of Al Batinah South. Only about 4,368 might be believers.
